_description: Task template for bug fix evaluations

template.prompt:
Fix bug #{BUG_ID}: {BUG_DESCRIPTION}

Requirements:
1. Identify the root cause of the bug
2. Implement a fix that addresses the root cause
3. Add a regression test that would have caught this bug
4. Ensure all existing tests still pass
5. Document the fix in a commit message

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Bug is fixed and cannot be reproduced
- [ ] Regression test added and passing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced

variables.BUG_ID: Unique identifier for the bug (e.g., AUTH-123)
variables.BUG_DESCRIPTION: Clear description of the bug behavior
